bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND COMPUTER SOFTWARE APPLICATIONS FOR SELECTING SECURITIES FOR AN INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO

nplcit.text: "First Trust Exchange-Traded Alphadex Fund, et al. - N-1A/A - On 3/14/07; SEC Info (hereinafter "First Trust"); an excerpt containing seven (7) selected pages; source www.secinfo.com
Barclays Global Investors Announces the Launch of the First Style-Based International Exchange Traded Funds for U.S. Investors; Business Wire; August 5 , 2005; 2-pages
Drift Happens; Israelsen, Craig L; Financial Planning, v 29 , n 11; November 1999; 6-pages
Thinking outside THE BOX; Schiffres, Manuel; Kiplinger's Personal Finance Mutual Funds; Spring 2006; 5-pages
Introducing the New S&P U.S. Style Indices; Standard & Poor's; October 6, 2005; 6-pages
SEC Info - First Trust Exchange-Traded Alphadex Fund, et al. - N-1A/A - On 3/14/07; www.secinfo.com; 03/14/07, 7-pages (EXCERPT)

abstract.p: Provided are methods and computer software applications for generating a stock portfolio, and/or enhanced stock index, through using a plurality of growth factors and a plurality of value factors to rank stocks, and for constructing investment vehicles based on the stock portfolio. The method, software application, or computer apparatus of the present technology employs a novel stock selection strategy to select stocks from a pre-selected universe of securities such as a commercially available stock market index in order to create a stock portfolio, and/or enhanced stock index, and a fund based thereon that can generate positive alpha as compared to a fund based on the pre-selected universe of securities.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: METHODS AND COMPUTER SOFTWARE APPLICATIONS FOR SELECTING SECURITIES FOR AN INVESTMENT PORTFOLIO
METHODES ET LOGICIEL D'APPLICATIONS INFORMATIQUES POUR LE CHOIX DE GARANTIES DANS UN PORTEFEUILLE DE PLACEMENT
Methods and Computer Software Applications for Selecting Securities for An Investment Portfolio

abstract.p: Provided are methods and computer software applications for generating a stock portfolio, and/or enhanced stock index, through using a plurality of growth factors and a plurality of value factors to rank stocks, and for constructing investment vehicles based on the stock portfolio. The method, software application, or computer apparatus of the present technology employs a novel stock selection strategy to select stocks from a pre-selected universe of securities such as a commercially available stock market index in order to create a stock portfolio, and/or enhanced stock index, and a fund based thereon that can generate positive alpha as compared to a fund based on the pre-selected universe of securities.
